Topic.Title: How to remove You Can See; You Can Go

Posts.EditableText:
Howdy,

I'm working on a game very similar to Hitchiker's, where that's not displayed and you need to explore around for yourself. How would I go about removing these from the player's view?
Posts.HTML:
Howdy,

I'm working on a game very similar to Hitchiker's, where that's not displayed and you need to explore around for yourself. How would I go about removing these from the player's view?

Posts.EditableText:
I believe the "Automatically generate room descriptions" option is what you want. (Game element; "Room descriptions" tab)

Or you can use the options on that tab to show and hide individual parts of the description.
